No, it does not "work fine."

The download link for utorrent is not from the original site, and is broken. The Utorrent site was hacked yesterday and the utorrent downloads were infected with malware. For all we know, the broken download in this manual pointed to the malware.

It instructs people to disable uPnP port mapping and NAT-PMP port mapping, which will cut them off from being reachable. It also tells people to set the global maximum upload rate to 10 kB/s, regardless of their real upload rate.
